title: OSP Fabricates Iraq-Al Qaeda Connection Intelligence for WHIG Distribution
description: Office of Special Plans produces systematically fabricated intelligence reports claiming operational connections between Iraq and Al-Qaeda, specifically designed for WHIG's propaganda campaign distribution. The reports directly contradict CIA and FBI analysis but provide essential talking points for administration officials.
significance: Shows direct coordination between intelligence fabrication and propaganda dissemination operations, demonstrating how false intelligence was systematically created for public consumption.

sources.title: Pentagon Report on Pre-War Intelligence Activities
